title.rendered: [2023] 300+ Courses to Prepare your Microsoft Azure Certification

content.rendered:
Microsoft Azure was the second-largest cloud service provider in 2022 Q3 according to canalys’ latest report.

Top Cloud Providers
Provider Market share 2022 growth rate
Amazon Web Services (AWS) 32% 27%
Microsoft Azure 22% 35%
Google Cloud 9% 48%

Unsurprisingly, many people are getting Microsoft Azure certified. Microsoft currently offers about 20 cloud certifications, which entail passing a certification exam.

If you’d like to earn a Microsoft Azure certification, this Class Central article is for you. Below, we’ve compiled more than 300 online courses to help you prepare for your Azure exam.

Table of Content

To make this course list more navigable, we’ve broken it down by exam. Click on a category to jump to the corresponding resources.

Fundamentals-Level Certifications

  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Fundamentals
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Fundamentals

Associate-Level Certifications

  • Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer Associate
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Database Administrator Associate
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Security Engineer Associate
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate (Legacy)
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Network Engineer Associate
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Stack Hub Operator Associate
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate (Legacy)

Expert-Level Certifications

  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert (Legacy)
  • Microsoft Certified: DevOps Engineer Expert

Specialty Certifications

  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Virtual Desktop Specialty
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure for SAP Workloads Specialty
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure IoT Developer Specialty

More Certifications

If you don’t find what you need in the course list below, browser Class Central’s catalog of 100K courses or visit our thematic collections:

  • 1000+ Free Developer and IT Certifications
  • 800+ Hours of Free LinkedIn Learning Courses with Free Certification
  • 200+ AWS Certifications Training Courses
  • 100+ Google Cloud Certifications Training Courses
  • Harvard Computer Science Courses with Free Certificate

You can find all our free certificates articles here.
